title: Product #name#
onLoad: console.log('Product Loaded...', { params }); findAndReplace('#name#', params.id); return params.id;

action.onClick: console.log('Product Click Me...', { params }); toast.success('ðŸ¦„ Wow so easy!', { position: "top-right", autoClose: 5000, hideProgressBar: false, closeOnClick: true, pauseOnHover: true, draggable: true, progress: undefined, theme: "light", transition: toastTransition.Flip, });
